verses.verse: He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H398>eat<s%> that which you <S%H4672>find.<s%> <S%H398>Eat<s%> this <S%H4039>scroll,<s%> and <S%H3212>go,<s%> <S%H1696>speak<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
So I <S%H6605>opened<s%> my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and he caused me to <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H4039>scroll.<s%>

He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> cause your <S%H990>belly<s%> to <S%H398>eat,<s%> and <S%H4390>fill<s%> your <S%H4578>bowels<s%> with this <S%H4039>scroll<s%> that I <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H398>you.<s%> Then I ate <S%H4966>it;<s%> and it was as sweet as <S%H1706>honey<s%> in my <S%H6310>mouth.<s%>
He <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H3212>go<s%> <S%H935>to<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> my words to <S%H1697>them.<s%>

For you are not <S%H7971>sent<s%> to a <S%H5971>people<s%> of a <S%H6012>strange<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> and of a <S%H3515>hard<s%> <S%H3956>language,<s%> but to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel;<s%>

not to <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H5971>peoples<s%> of a <S%H6012>strange<s%> <S%H8193>speech<s%> and of a <S%H3515>hard<s%> <S%H3956>language,<s%> whose <S%H1697>words<s%> you can not <S%H8085>understand.<s%> <S%H7971>Surely,<s%> if I sent you to <S%H8085>them,<s%> they would listen to you.

But the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H14>will<s%> not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H14>you;<s%> for they will not <S%H8085>listen<s%> to <S%H1004>me:<s%> for all the house of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> are <S%H2389>obstinate<s%> and <S%H7186>hard-hearted.<s%>

<S%H5414>Behold,<s%> I have made your <S%H6440>face<s%> <S%H2389>hard<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> their <S%H6440>faces,<s%> and your <S%H4696>forehead<s%> <S%H2389>hard<s%> <S%H5980>against<s%> their <S%H4696>foreheads.<s%>

As an <S%H8068>adamant<s%> <S%H2389>harder<s%> than <S%H6864>flint<s%> have I <S%H5414>made<s%> your <S%H4696>forehead:<s%> <S%H3372>don't<s%> be afraid of <S%H2865>them,<s%> neither be dismayed at their <S%H6440>looks,<s%> though they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

Moreover he <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H1121>me,<s%> Son of <S%H120>man,<s%> all my <S%H1697>words<s%> that I shall <S%H1696>speak<s%> to you <S%H3947>receive<s%> in your <S%H3824>heart,<s%> and <S%H8085>hear<s%> with your <S%H241>ears.<s%>

<S%H3212>Go<s%> <S%H935>to<s%> them of the <S%H1473>captivity,<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of your <S%H5971>people,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H559>them,<s%> and tell <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh;<s%> whether they will <S%H8085>hear,<s%> or whether they will <S%H2308>forbear.<s%>

Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> lifted me <S%H5375>up,<s%> and I <S%H8085>heard<s%> <S%H310>behind<s%> me the <S%H6963>voice<s%> of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>rushing,<s%> <S%H1288>saying,<s%> Blessed be the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> from his <S%H4725>place.<s%>

I heard the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H3671>wings<s%> of the living <S%H2416>creatures<s%> as they <S%H5401>touched<s%> <S%H802>one<s%> <S%H269>another,<s%> and the <S%H6963>noise<s%> of the <S%H212>wheels<s%> <S%H5980>beside<s%> <S%H6963>them,<s%> even the noise of a <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H7494>rushing.<s%>

So the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> lifted me <S%H5375>up,<s%> and took me <S%H3947>away;<s%> and I <S%H3212>went<s%> in <S%H4751>bitterness,<s%> in the <S%H2534>heat<s%> of my <S%H7307>spirit;<s%> and the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was strong on <S%H2388>me.<s%>

Then I <S%H935>came<s%> to them of the <S%H1473>captivity<s%> at Tel <S%H8512>Aviv,<s%> that <S%H3427>lived<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar,<s%> and to where they <S%H3427>lived;<s%> and I <S%H3427>sat<s%> <S%H3427>there<s%> <S%H8074>overwhelmed<s%> <S%H8432>among<s%> them <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days.<s%>
It happened at the <S%H7097>end<s%> of <S%H7651>seven<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> that the <S%H1697>word<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> came to <S%H559>me,<s%> saying,

<S%H1121>Son<s%> of <S%H120>man,<s%> I have <S%H5414>made<s%> you a <S%H6822>watchman<s%> to the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel:<s%> therefore <S%H8085>hear<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> from my <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and give them warning from <S%H2094>me.<s%>

When I <S%H559>tell<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> You shall <S%H4191>surely<s%> <S%H4191>die;<s%> and you give him no <S%H2094>warning,<s%> nor <S%H1696>speak<s%> to <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked<s%> from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> to save his <S%H2421>life;<s%> the same <S%H7563>wicked<s%> man shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1245>require<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Yet if you <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H7563>wicked,<s%> and he <S%H7725>doesn't<s%> turn from his <S%H7562>wickedness,<s%> nor from his <S%H7563>wicked<s%> <S%H1870>way,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H5771>iniquity;<s%> but you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

<S%H7725>Again,<s%> when a <S%H6662>righteous<s%> man does <S%H7725>turn<s%> from his <S%H6664>righteousness,<s%> and <S%H6213>commit<s%> <S%H5766>iniquity,<s%> and I <S%H5414>lay<s%> a stumbling <S%H4383>block<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> <S%H4191>him,<s%> he shall die: because you have not given him <S%H2094>warning,<s%> he shall <S%H4191>die<s%> in his <S%H2403>sin,<s%> and his <S%H6666>righteous<s%> deeds which he has <S%H6213>done<s%> shall not be <S%H2142>remembered;<s%> but his <S%H1818>blood<s%> will I <S%H1245>require<s%> at your <S%H3027>hand.<s%>

Nevertheless if you <S%H2094>warn<s%> the <S%H6662>righteous<s%> <S%H6662>man,<s%> that the righteous not <S%H2398>sin,<s%> and he does not <S%H2398>sin,<s%> he shall <S%H2421>surely<s%> <S%H2421>live,<s%> because he took <S%H2094>warning;<s%> and you have <S%H5337>delivered<s%> your <S%H5315>soul.<s%>

The <S%H3027>hand<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> was there on <S%H559>me;<s%> and he said to <S%H6965>me,<s%> Arise, go <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H1237>plain,<s%> and I will there talk with <S%H1696>you.<s%>

Then I <S%H6965>arose,<s%> and went <S%H3318>forth<s%> into the <S%H1237>plain:<s%> and <S%H3519>behold,<s%> the glory of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> <S%H5975>stood<s%> <S%H3519>there,<s%> as the glory which I <S%H7200>saw<s%> by the <S%H5104>river<s%> <S%H3529>Chebar;<s%> and I <S%H5307>fell<s%> on my <S%H6440>face.<s%>

Then the <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> <S%H935>entered<s%> into <S%H5975>me,<s%> and set me on my <S%H7272>feet;<s%> and he <S%H1696>spoke<s%> with <S%H559>me,<s%> and said to <S%H935>me,<s%> Go, <S%H5462>shut<s%> yourself <S%H8432>inside<s%> your <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But <S%H1121>you,<s%> son of <S%H120>man,<s%> <S%H5414>behold,<s%> they shall lay <S%H5688>bands<s%> on <S%H631>you,<s%> and shall bind you with <S%H3318>them,<s%> and you shall not go out among <S%H8432>them:<s%>

and I will make your <S%H3956>tongue<s%> <S%H1692>stick<s%> to the roof of your <S%H2441>mouth,<s%> that you shall be <S%H481>mute,<s%> and shall not be to them a <S%H376>reprover;<s%> for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>

But when I <S%H1696>speak<s%> <S%H854>with<s%> <S%H6605>you,<s%> I will open your <S%H6310>mouth,<s%> and you shall <S%H559>tell<s%> <S%H559>them,<s%> Thus says the <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3069>Yahweh:<s%> He who <S%H8085>hears,<s%> let him <S%H8085>hear;<s%> and he who <S%H2308>forbears,<s%> let him <S%H2308>forbear:<s%> for they are a <S%H4805>rebellious<s%> <S%H1004>house.<s%>
